EmailTemplate.name: 24HoursSinceStageOnSMTCFA
EmailTemplate.subject: Mockup Not Sent For Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Phunions,
It's been 24 hours since the client made payment, and we haven't sent this mockup for approval. Please coordinate and figure out why.
{!Order.WONameLink__c}
Thanks, Ralph the Rooster
